pages.text: These will slowly grow over time and produce $(l:items/silk_cocoon)cocoons$().$(br2)They do not spawn in any specific biome, nor can they be bred, but you can hatch them from eggs. See over for egg drop locations.

pages.name: Silkworm
pages.text: You can drop leaves near them to speed the process up and potentially produce more!
Silkworms do not spawn naturally, nor can they be bred, but can be hatched from eggs (with a chance of success).$(br2)Eggs can be found by breaking tall grass in a similar manner to seeds.
In addition, silkworm eggs can also be found by breaking leaves, in a similar manner as one would to find saplings.
